channel.title: Baser on measured.
channel.description: Recent content in Baser on measured.

item.title: apply functions
item.description: # packages library(tidyverse) The good ol’ apply functions I first met this class in my true isolation days. I was on scholarship at a biomedical institute where it felt like nobody thought a second-year university student should be thus polluting their shades. I want to know how the function and its arguments can be vecorised. Should I be experimenting with a list or with a tibble? Let’s try a tibble first, hopefully I’m right in thinking of it as a special type of list.
